name: INSTALL NEW RELIC SERVER MONIT
notes:
Installs the [New Relic server monitoring](http://newrelic.com/server-monitoring) agent on **RedHat** or **CentOS**. Works with both 32 and 64-bit architectures.

The New Relic server agent does not require root access to run. However it requires root access to install, because it writes to protected directories and interacts with the system package databases.
content:
# Your New Relic license key
NEWRELIC_LICENSE_KEY=

if [ `getconf LONG_BIT` -eq 64 ] || [ `uname -i` -eq 'x86_64' ]; then
  # 64-bit
  rpm -Uvh https://yum.newrelic.com/pub/newrelic/el5/x86_64/newrelic-repo-5-3.noarch.rpm
else
  # 32-bit
  rpm -Uvh https://yum.newrelic.com/pub/newrelic/el5/i386/newrelic-repo-5-3.noarch.rpm
fi

yum install -y newrelic-sysmond

if [ -n "$NEWRELIC_LICENSE_KEY" ]; then
  nrsysmond-config --set license_key=$NEWRELIC_LICENSE_KEY
fi

/etc/init.d/newrelic-sysmond start
